channel.title: Tok_function on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: [Hive] Hive UDF not supported in insert/values command
item.description: 创建一个带有timestamp字段的表，想要在insert/values语句中使用UDF，结果报错。 hive> create table t2 (id int, time timestamp); OK Time taken: 0.045 seconds hive> insert into t2 values(1,current_timestamp()); FAILED: SemanticException [Error 10293]: Unable to create temp file for insert values Expr*ession of type TOK_FUNCTION not supported in insert/values 参考一中提到：”Hive does not support literals for complex types (array,map, struct, union), so it is not possible to use them in INSERTINTO…VALUES clauses. This means that the user cannot insert datainto a complex datatype column using the INSERT INTO…VALUESclause.
